Located in Guelph, Ontario

Sessions can be booked on the following days:

Our Sessions:

Package Focus Length Cost
Basic Homework Support 30 min $25/session
Instructional Lesson Instruction and Extra Practice 1 hour $50/week
Intensive Lesson Instruction Twice per Week 1 hour 2x/week $100/week
Group Group/Project Work (max: 3 students) 1 hour $50/session
